nodes.text: V2A DAZ was a droid that served as a forensic science commander for the Forensics Unit in the Coruscant Security Force during the Clone Wars. Following the death of senator Onaconda Farr, the droid made a report on the Rodian's autopsy.
The name of the science commander is only identified through the all-Aurebesh forensic report held by police inspector Tan Divo. The report says:
